about_the_game:
Joey's Shisha Simulator puts you in the shoes of Joey, a college student who ventures into the risky waters of business and chooses to start a hookah shop. Start with a small space and grow your business from the ground up. Your wit, management skills, attention to detail and creativity will be key to building your own unique and thriving smokehouse. If you think you've got what it takes to run a shisha lounge, fire up the coals, get the tobacco ready and start preparing!

Design your lounge

Design and furnish your lounge to attract customers by choosing from a wide range of furniture, decorations and themes. There are a variety of furnishings and skins, such as a cloud theme, a tea room, or even a cyber lounge. There are no limits to your imagination and if your business thrives you can buy better and better pieces! Customers will be attracted by the look and cleanliness, so it's important to keep the smokehouse welcoming.

Prepare hookahs

Master the art of making the perfect hookah with various flavours and variants to satisfy your guests. To each their own, everyone has a different taste when it comes to hookah flavors so you'll have to gradually learn how to satisfy as many of them as possible to leave you a positive review.

Keep it steady

Manage your supplies and handle day-to-day operations to keep your smokehouse booming. You'll have to organize your storage, set up a good menu for customers, keep track of what's going on through the dashboard. It won't be easy, duties like taxes, restock and watching what customers want will be key to not going out of business.

What awaits you:

  • Customization of furnishings, walls, lighting

  • Preparation of several types of hookahs influenced by your choice of tobacco, style and the taste the customer desires

  • Managing your own storage, ordering products and stocking them

  • Customers who do not stay around forever have their own demands and patience

  • Maintaining the business, such as cleaning, ordering new machines and repairing existing ones

  • Establishing your own branding, dining menu and corporate identity

  • You don't just have a smokehouse, you'll also be making teas, drinks, toasts, if you so choose to

We are thinking about our beloved streamers. Twitch integration to make chat become your customers is on the way!

Plus, a gameplay trailer with more in-game footage is coming soon!

short_description: Start your own shisha lounge from scratch! Prepare hookahs, work behind the bar, serve customers, manage finances, design your shop and expand your business. But beware, unexpected events can happen, can your business overcome them?
